entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
